movies.title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
movies.description: A story of a legendary concierge at a famous European hotel and his friendship with a young employee who becomes his most trusted protégé.

movies.title: Saving Private Ryan
movies.description: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.

movies.title: The Favourite
movies.description: In early 18th century England, a frail Queen Anne occupies the throne and her close friend, Lady Sarah, governs the country in her stead.

movies.title: The Big Lebowski
movies.description: The Dude seeks recompense for his ruined rug and enlists his bowling buddies to help get it.
